actions.name: BatchCheckLayerAvailability
actions.description: Grants permission to check the availability of multiple image layers in a specified registry and repository

actions.name: BatchDeleteImage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a list of specified images within a specified repository

actions.name: BatchGetImage
actions.description: Grants permission to get detailed information for specified images within a specified repository

actions.name: BatchGetRepositoryScanningConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve repository scanning configuration for a list of repositories

actions.name: BatchImportUpstreamImage
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the image from the upstream registry and import it to your private registry

actions.name: CompleteLayerUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to inform Amazon ECR that the image layer upload for a specified registry, repository name, and upload ID, has completed

actions.name: CreatePullThroughCacheRule
actions.description: Grants permission to create new pull-through cache rule

actions.name: CreateRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to create an image repository

actions.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified lifecycle policy

actions.name: DeletePullThroughCacheRule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the pull-through cache rule

actions.name: DeleteRegistryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the registry policy

actions.name: DeleteRepository
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing image repository

actions.name: DeleteRepositoryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the repository policy from a specified repository

actions.name: DescribeImageReplicationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve replication status about an image in a registry, including failure reason if replication fails

actions.name: DescribeImageScanFindings
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the image scan findings for the specified image

actions.name: DescribeImages
actions.description: Grants permission to get metadata about the images in a repository, including image size, image tags, and creation date

actions.name: DescribePullThroughCacheRules
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the pull-through cache rules

actions.name: DescribeRegistry
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the registry settings

actions.name: DescribeRepositories
actions.description: Grants permission to describe image repositories in a registry

actions.name: GetAuthorizationToken
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a token that is valid for a specified registry for 12 hours

actions.name: GetDownloadUrlForLayer
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the download URL corresponding to an image layer

actions.name: GetLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified lifecycle policy

actions.name: GetLifecyclePolicyPreview
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the results of the specified lifecycle policy preview request

actions.name: GetRegistryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the registry policy

actions.name: GetRegistryScanningConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve registry scanning configuration

actions.name: GetRepositoryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the repository policy for a specified repository

actions.name: InitiateLayerUpload
actions.description: Grants permission to notify Amazon ECR that you intend to upload an image layer

actions.name: ListImages
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the image IDs for a given repository

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for an Amazon ECR resource

actions.name: PutImage
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update the image manifest associated with an image

actions.name: PutImageScanningConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the image scanning configuration for a repository

actions.name: PutImageTagMutability
actions.description: Grants permission to update the image tag mutability settings for a repository

actions.name: PutLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a lifecycle policy

actions.name: PutRegistryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to update the registry policy

actions.name: PutRegistryScanningConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update registry scanning configuration

actions.name: PutReplicationConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the replication configuration for the registry

actions.name: ReplicateImage
actions.description: Grants permission to replicate images to the destination registry

actions.name: SetRepositoryPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to apply a repository policy on a specified repository to control access permissions

actions.name: StartImageScan
actions.description: Grants permission to start an image scan

actions.name: StartLifecyclePolicyPreview
actions.description: Grants permission to start a preview of the specified lifecycle policy

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon ECR resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon ECR resource

actions.name: UploadLayerPart
actions.description: Grants permission to upload an image layer part to Amazon ECR
